| Resource    | List                                                |
|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------|
| agent:id    | 000,001,002,003,004,005,006,007,008,009,010,011,012 |


| Actions            | Resources | Allow           | Deny    |

| syscollector:read  | agent:id  | 001,003,005,007 |         |
| syscollector:clear | agent:id  | 001,003,005,007 |         |
